meanings.definition: A mass of small bubbles formed on or in liquid, typically by agitation or fermentation.
meanings.sent1: The foams on top of the hot chocolate looked so fluffy.
meanings.sent2: The foams from the ocean waves sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The foams in the bathtub made it seem like a bubbly party.
meanings.sent4: The foams on the cappuccino resembled a cloud floating on top.
meanings.sent5: The foams in the soda were so thick you could almost scoop them up.

meanings.definition: A frothy mass of small bubbles formed on or in liquid.
meanings.sent1: The gentle stream was filled with foams that glistened in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The foams on the beer made it look extra refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The foams in the fountain danced playfully in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The foams on the milkshake were like a sweet crown on top.
meanings.sent5: The foams on the bubble bath made it feel like a luxurious spa.
